headline: There Is a Candle – A Psalm
description: Aleksandr’s fifth attempt at a psalm, centered on the refrain 'There is a candle that will never go out.' The poem unfolds as a meditation on endurance, faith, love, and divine light, balancing fragility with eternal flame. Accompanied by an image of a single candle burning steady in the dark.
resonantThread: Psalmic writings and poetic prayers within Ousia Bloom

motifMap.meaning: faith enduring despite wind and sin
context of trial, sin, and forgetfulness
